decision_conditions: The applicant has submitted insufficient information to satisfy the requirements of Condition 6 (Construction Management Plan) of planning permission 22/02235/FUL. Therefore, the proposal would fail to demonstrate that the amenities of the surrounding residential occupiers, highway safety and the free flow of traffic would be safeguarded in accordance with policies T4 and T7 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS7, DM9 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

The applicant has submitted insufficient information to satisfy the requirements of Condition 17 (Drainage Design) of planning permission 22/02235/FUL. The applicant has not demonstrated the provision of a satisfactory means of surface water disposal incorporated into the design and the build of the proposed development and therefore fails to prevent the increased risk of flooding, in accordance with policy SI.13 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS1 and DM4 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required for Conditions 6 (Construction Management Plan), 13 (Arboricultural Impact Assessment), 14 (Nature Conservation Enhancements) and 17 (Drainage Design) of planning permission 22/02235/FUL (Demolition of existing dwelling and erection of three storey new dwelling with 2nos rear outbuildings, swimming pool and associated landscaping.)
